attributes.action: Give the country a bank holiday if the Lionesses win the World Cup.
attributes.additional_details: To celebrate the Lionesses great achievement and to bring the country together.
attributes.background: Our women’s football team are in the World Cup final. To allow the country to celebrate we should give all an extra Bank Holiday.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/642533
